body:
Good Evening,


I'm an archaeologist using Radiance to do some daylight modeling in
medieval churches.  I would like to include period-correct stained
glass in the windows (in this case 13th century grisaille).  However,
I have no idea where to find information on the transmittance index
and other properties of stained glass.


Has anyone modelled something like this before?


Can anyone point me toward a resource that might have details on the
properties of stained and/or historic glass?


Thanks for your help.


-- Anthony
